oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Herd Level Indicators for the Prediction of High-Risk Dairy Herds for Subclinical Ketosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Duffield, Todd
Bagg, Randal
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: subclinical ketosis
surveillance
preventive practice
herd-level indicators
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: While several tests and surrogate measures have been developed for diagnosing subclinical ketosis at the individual cow level, herd-level indicators to predict which herds might benefit from increased surveillance and enhanced preventive practices could be extremely useful to veterinarians. This project investigated the usefulness of potential herd-level indicators for predicting high-risk herds for subclinical ketosis.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2002; 175-176
